Name: Sisters_Possession1
About the game: A story Of Heroes In the Far Future. The Laurasia Empire, located in the western part of the Eurasian continent, was being invaded by the Jungals, a powerful nomadic equestrian race that appeared in the east. Overrun by the overwhelming military might of the light cavalry, the people of the empire are terrified and frightened of the carnage that awaits them. McMurdo, a holy knight who lives in an orphanage in Lipetsk, a provincial city of the empire, stands up against the invaders together with his sister Lismy. Key Points Of the Film â– possession System The main character and his male companions have the 'possession' ability and can fight by possessing the bodies of girls. More than sixty of my friends! Combine the power of your spirit with the power of your body to defeat powerful enemies. Three Soldiers System This work is a tactical simulation RPG. In particular, the roles of infantry, cavalry, and artillery on the battlefield are clearly defined, and these are effectively utilized to advance the game. Gamepad play recommended
